name: MetalWindChimesforSleepandRelaxation
0:
”Alexa, open metal wind chimes”
”Alexa, start metal wind chimes”
”Alexa, launch metal wind chimes”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: metal wind chimes
des:
Let the Metal Wind Chimes sounds clear your mind and take you to a quiet place of reflection.

"Metal Wind Chimes for Sleep and Relaxation" plays calming sound loops to help you fall asleep faster, sleep better, relax, meditate, or drown out distracting noises.

The vibrations and frequencies of these powerful sounds have shown tremendous healing properties. Just relax and feel the activation of different brain centers as you go deeper with sleep sound.

By default, the sound will play until you stop it. To stop the music, say "Alexa, stop.” To resume it again, say "Alexa, resume."

SHOW YOUR SUPPORT:

Your reviews and feedback are important to us! Please consider showing your support by writing a review for Sleep Sounds.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
